amendment.description: To determine the effectiveness of Real Estate Assessment Center physical inspections.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3926 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2868-2869; text: CR S2868) To determine the effectiveness of Real Estate Assessment Center physical inspections.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3926 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3896.
